gewathu wagawa sandaha nawina widyathmakawa palathuru gas baddha kara situwa , keti kalayak athulatha aswanu laba gatha haki kramawedayak polgasoowita yala maha aayathanaya handunwa di thibe.homagama pradeshiya lekam kottasaye polgasoowita ha ee awata pradeshawala krushikarmika katayuthuwala niratha wana tharuna kandayamak wisin pihituwa gena athi me aayathanaya magin ambaa, rambautan, pera, miti ambaaralla, duriyan, kesel, katu anoda, wali anoda, alipera, kamaranga, nasnaran, leman, jamanaran ha mangus aadi palathuru gas warga widyathmakawa baddha kirima sidu kere.ghana kala pradeshawala saruwata sadena palathuru wargayak wana ‚Äúmasan‚Äù warthamana welenda pole janapi‡∑äraya ha ihala illumak pawathina apal ha samana rasakin samanwitha dehi gediyak ha samana palatharu wargayaki .me palathuru wargaye pala situwa masa nawayak wani kalaya sita paladawa laba ganimata hakiwe.gunathmaka bhawayen ihalin pawathina warthamana welenda pole ihala illumak pawathina palathuru warga thama gewaththe waga kara emagin amathara aadayamak laba ganimata asthawa uda we.me aayathanaya mangin laba gathahaki palathuru gas warga situ wimen anathuruwa awashya kakshana danuma ha upades nomile laba dima sidu kare.me sandaha wisthara yala maha anka 157/ ee horana para piliyandala karyalayen laba gatha hakiya.
